title: Republican Bernie Moreno drops out of crowded Ohio Senate primary

author: Associated Press
title: After meeting with Trump, Bernie Moreno leaves US Senate primary

sentence: The eventual winner of the Republican primary will likely face Democratic Rep. Tim Ryan in the race for the Ohio seat.
author: Ewan Palmer
title: Donald Trump Clears Path for MAGA Ticket in Ohio's GOP Senate Race

sentence: Rep. Tim Ryan, D-Ohio, appears to be the front-runner for the Democrat nomination for that seat.
author: Tyler Olson
title: Longtime Trump adviser Kellyanne Conway backs Jane Timken in Ohio Senate GOP primary
